sentences.sContent: Can you help me blow up these balloons?
sentences.sCn: 你帮我把这些气球吹起来好吗？

sentences.sContent: He burst the balloon in my face.
sentences.sCn: 他对着我的脸弄爆了气球。

synos.tran: 使像气球般鼓起；使激增

phrases.pCn: [外科学]气囊血管成形术；球囊成形术（等于percutaneous transluminal angioplasty）
毫无效果，毫无作用(意指如铅气球无法飞升)

remMethod.val: ball(球) ＋ oon(表物) → 球类玩具 → 玩具气球

trans.tranOther: an object made of brightly coloured thin rubber, that is filled with air and used as a toy or decoration for parties
